No one needs to be nervous, no matter how afraid it is, no matter who we are. We came to Vienna today to win hearts.
We are a nation that exists in Austria, in Germany, in all other countries of Europe, with profound, experiential, peace and friendship messages.
No one is afraid of new Turkey. The new Turkey is a great opportunity for Europe, a solid door opened to Muslims.
At a time when the whole world is playing three monkeys in Egypt; we blow out coup d'état, massacre massacre, état de résistance.
We will continue to be at the side of justice, side by side with oppression in the conflicts in the Middle East.
